DESCRIPTION: Deletes all data from a row of an Excel spreadsheet object. It does not delete the row.
EXAMPLE:
The following example deletes row 10 from a spreadsheet.
<!--- Get the spreadsheet data as a query. ---> <cfquery name="courses" datasource="cfdocexamples" cachedwithin="#CreateTimeSpan(0, 6, 0, 0)#"> SELECT CORNUMBER,DEPT_ID,CORLEVEL,COURSE_ID,CORNAME,CORDESC,LASTUPDATE FROM COURSELIST </cfquery> <cfscript> ///We need an absolute path, so get the current directory path. theFile=GetDirectoryFromPath(GetCurrentTemplatePath()) & courses.xls"; //Create a new Excel spreadsheet object and add the query data. theSheet = SpreadsheetNew("CourseData"); SpreadsheetAddRows(theSheet,courses); //Delete row 10. SpreadsheetDeleteRow(theSheet,"10"); </cfscript> <!--- Write the spreadsheet to a file, replacing any existing file. ---> <cfspreadsheet action="write" filename="#theFile#" name="theSheet" sheet=1 sheetname="courses" overwrite=true>

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: The Excel spreadsheet object from which to delete the row.
